name: Interactive Tree 2
description:
I had previously made a version of this and realized it wasnt working right when I used a library. I ripped the entire thing apart and built it in a completely different way. I think this one is better. Also it seems to work using a library.


Interactive tree component features:


  1. Nodes open and close like a normal tree would
  2. System remembers open and closed state as would expect
  3. Easy to reorder L0 and L1 levels.
  4. L2-L4 not reordable
  5. Easy to build a tree quickly
  6. Supports scrolling for long trees
  7. Icons change when collapsed/expanded
  8. Auto-indentation


It would be nice to have a native tree component, but this is the next best thing.
